title: Build Error (github mirror) OSX 10.10 (building go from source)
body:
Installed Binary: go version go1.7 darwin/amd64 Repository: GitHub master as at approx Sept 1 2016. OSX101.0 (darwin/amd64) Standard xcode installed AND clang version 3.7.0 (tags/RELEASE_370/final) Target: x86_64-apple-darwin14.5.0log/syslog installed from LLVM website. 
~/go/src>GOROOT_BOOTSTRAP=/usr/local/go ./all.bash
...
##### Building packages and commands for darwin/amd64.
# crypto/x509
crypto/x509/root_cgo_darwin.go:16:10: fatal error: 'CoreFoundation/CoreFoundation.h' file not found
#include 
         ^
1 error generated.
net/mail
The bin directory contains gofmt. No compiler or other binaries. Not sure what to expect, since first attempt to build.
